entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 6:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 40 %

Dewpoint: -31.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
